name: Noteloop Dance
description:
Noteloop Dance lets you organize and watch your dance videos with ease. It includes a video player designed specifically for dance videos allowing you to slow down your videos, loop sections, mirror them and more.

The Windows version is currently in a alpha state with very little functionality.  If you are looking for a fully functional version of Noteloop Dance, please download Noteloop Dance for iOS from the App Store.  

The Windows version will be updated often while in alpha so we recommend that you install the Windows version via the itch.io app so you can receive updates automatically.

For the latest release news, follow @NoteloopDance on Twitter.

For the latest development news, follow @saji8k on Twitter.
